pages.text: By the time (i.e. historic time is witness that)
Man is certainly at a loss
except those who believe and do righteous works and recommend to one another, the truth, and recommend to one another, patience
Sorrowful is the state of every slanderer, defamer
who accumulates wealth and keeps on counting it
He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal
No, he will definitely be flung into the crushing one
And what will make you realize what the crushing one is
(It is the) fire of Allah, kindled
which is made to rise over the hearts
it will certainly be closed on them
Did you not consider, how your Fosterer dealt with the owners of the elephant
Did He not make their plot useless
and send on them flocks of flying creatures
who pelted them with stones of baked clay
so that He made them like eaten up straw (husk)
